mapper.select: SELECT ust_no, ust_classify, ust_code, ust_name, ust_sale_cost, ust_sale_cnt, ust_sale_total, ust_stock_cnt, ust_comment, ust_status, ust_delete, user_id, insert_time, update_time FROM user_stock WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND ust_delete = '0' ORDER BY ust_name, ust_classify LIMIT #{nowPage}, #{row}

SELECT ust_no, ust_classify, ust_code, ust_name, ust_sale_cost, ust_sale_cnt, ust_sale_total, ust_stock_cnt, ust_comment, ust_status, ust_delete, user_id, insert_time, update_time FROM user_stock WHERE ust_no = #{ustNo} AND user_id = #{userId} AND ust_delete = '0'
SELECT ust_name, SUM(ust_sale_cost) AS sumSaleCost, SUM(ust_sale_cnt) AS sumSaleCnt, user_id FROM user_stock WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND ust_delete = '0' GROUP BY ust_name ORDER BY ust_name
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM user_stock WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND ust_delete = '0'
